sentences.sentence: This statue was found in Temple t at Kawa, in Upper Nubia.
sentences.translation: 这座雕像被发现在庙由T佤，在上努比亚。

sentences.sentence: Based on the features of geomorphology and strata in the crossing area, the Nubia sandstone is selected to be the surrounding rock.
sentences.translation: 根据穿越处地貌及地层特性决定将努比亚砂岩作为定向钻穿越的围岩。

sentences.sentence: Tomb paintings of the New Kingdom show that Nubia was regarded as one of the four corners of the world, over which Egypt had control.
sentences.translation: 新王国墓画的显示，努比亚视为已被控制四个角落之一的世界，在埃及。
